pages.text: The OG Kush Strain$(br2)Base THC: 25% $(br)Base CBD: 10% $(br)Effect: Resistance
OG Kush Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
OG Kush Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
OG Kush Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting OG Kush Weed in an Extractor
You can package your og kush weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
